post.body: & @caseywright thanks for the follow! I look forwarding to connecting with you and hope you have a happy new year!
GRRR PROCRASTINATION sucks! The gift my mom was getting me for xmas is gone bcuz she hasnt ordered it yet.... sighs
YEAH! I just finished writing Christmas cards to all my clients. I just hope it reaches them in time.... Better late than never right?
owies! My whole body hurts from exercising. I think I may be allergic to exercising... (If thats possible) Cant we all just eat cake?
Made cheesecake lollipops today for a client they look yummy! Have to write my christmas cards... Yes I know I am a procrastinator! lol
WOWZERS (inspector gaget would say) my blog is #4 on google! I havent touched it since sept... Check it out http://is.gd/bTOo
I am on my friends blog the www.themoxiemomblog.com she is a dial up persons worst nightmare!
Icicles r forming, My eyelashes have frost on them, & my feet r frostbitten! No not really, but this Texas weather is CRAZY I hate the cold!
Dont u just love being around enthusiastic people? Especially when u feel despondent... U just seem 2 forget all ur worries so lets b happy!
Why does everything pile up at once? Went 2 bethelhem revisited last night. Yolanda (my car) had 2 get a coolant flush guh. Hope shes ok now
Had a freaky friday moment (movie) this isnt my bed where am I did I pass out? This isnt my room blue walls, pink sheets, frilly things! lol
Went 2 a christmas party tonight & drank jamaica coffee YUMMY! At my cuz's house. Im having WAFFLES in the morn sounds swell!
Had to get a gift at Victoria Secrets.... Talk about AWKWARD! I blushed the entire time in line. (p.s. wasnt buying lingerie)
I have been on my feet for 8 1/2 hrs my feet are killing me! My cars engine is overheating... I hope its just the coolant not sure?
Went to a business mixer at a brewery w/ my dad & cuz. Drank some GREAT German Beer! I love working frmo home. Free time rocks me socks off!
Jumpin Jehoshaphats! Just got done presenting on our monday night training call. Exciting and nerve racking at the same time!
YES! I finally got my twhirl working again. Mcafee was blocking it grrr. They may take our lives, but they will NEVER take our FREEDOM!
They may take our lives, but they will NEVER take our FREEDOM!
Wow, yesterday someone asked me 2 b the head chef 4 their "soon 2 b company". Its all bcuz they tasted my choco covered strawberry chzcake!
Poopie diapers r GROSS! If I ever have kids ill have 2 pay my neighbor 2 change their poopie diapers or just hose them off in the yard! lol
Went to TCU last night! Ate dinner with my friend, watched a movie, and then played some games. Hope everyone had a happy thanksgiving!
MEH writing thank you cards.... Need I say more? At least im almost done!
I cant wait to go get Mr. Buttons! (hes my new donkey well going to be) I cant wait to start riding him.
Went to see Benjamin Button http://is.gd/2MTIv great movie! I would definitely recommend seeing it. I give it 2 thumbs up.
Oops I forgot to crop off the guys head... No I mean my head lol
Just got done doing situps. WOW I think you can finally see my 6 pack! http://is.gd/dIuk )
How to convert your worpress into a full fledged cms http://is.gd/80Fv ) Thanks @ryanbruce!
Im so excited! Tomorrow we are going to get 4 donkeys. Im going to train one of them which is a mamoth. Hopefully we can catch them... lol
Jinkies! My twitter score is 80/100. Whats yours? http://is.gd/dE1d ) U r trying 2 get 99/100. I think I have become twitter score obsessed!
My family and I had a "quilt christmas tree"... lol all our presents were under our quilt rack. Eh who needs to decorate a tree right?
Had an AMAZING time with all my realtives! Isnt family just great? The wine was AWESOME homemade sangria and zinfianfel yum. Italians lol
Merry Christmas my twits! I hope you all are blessed and enjoy this special day! Im off to my realtives yeah cant wait to see them all.
I think I may need 2 different humidifiers, 2 plastic bags 4 each of my tissues, & 2 de-humidifer. Thats what monk did. I hope It works 4 me
Eekers! I think I am coming down with a cold.... I have lost my voice for 3 days now and the drainage wont stop... I want 2 b like monk!
Man decorates basement with $10 worth of sharpies! http://is.gd/3QoK ) I am utterly impressed & hope he will come do my place next lol.
Well poo! I gave my parents a pic. of me as their "only" gift from me. They were like AWH... I was like grr and gave them their real gifts
Went 2 the candle light service tonight it was very halcyon. Went out for dinner. It was like a ghost town... Nothing was open well not much
http://twitpic.com/vx7a - I'm off to hilsborrow with the family (outlet mall). This "thing" woke me up this morning! I heard scurry scur ...
Word of the day: Eekers-excited, suprised, in awh) Eekers my check was just mailed! I love working from home! :)
Lunch:My futune cookie "A new relationship is about 2 blossom U will b blessed" & a chika flirted I was lost when she said my dad was cool!
